Chinese: 根据美国国民的一个投票，人们普遍认为穆斯林人和恐怖主义有关。

Chinese: 婚礼上饮料和食物那么丰富以至于那对年轻的新人开始怀疑他们本不该邀请更多的客人。

Chinese: 互联网的广泛应用使新一代的年轻人诞生了。

Chinese: 雖然冷戰已經過了這麼多年，俄羅斯人和德國人之間的仇恨還是沒有消除，在蘇聯曾經侵佔過的地區，這種仇恨就更深了。

I'll talk it over with Marty and see what he thinks.
Chinese: 我要和Marty讨论一下，看看他怎么想。

English: How do you feel about the issue?
Chinese: 你對這個問題有甚麼感受？

English: In this case, I think he is correct.
Chinese: 這樣的話，我想他是對的。

English: This decision is final.
What do you think of this plan?
This plan requires secrecy.
Chinese: 這個計劃必須保持秘密。

English: This plan will be very expensive to carry out.
Chinese: 這計劃執行起來花銷會很大。

English: This plan is being discussed right now.
Chinese: 这个计划现在正在讨论中。

English: What is the central aim of this plan?
Chinese: 這個計劃的主要目的是甚麼？

English: I know about this project for the most part.
What do you think about this plan?
Chinese: 你覺得這個計劃怎麼樣？

English: It is yet to be seen whether this plan will succeed or not.
Chinese: 这个计划能否成功还不得而知。

English: This style of hat is now in fashion.
Chinese: 这种款式的帽子现在很流行。

English: These shoes don't fit my feet.
This pair of shoes doesn't fit me.
Do you have these shoes in my size?
Chinese: 你們這款鞋子有我的尺寸嗎?

English: From the look of the sky, it may rain in the afternoon.
Chinese: 從天色看起來，下午可能會下雨。

English: It is said that treasure is buried in this area.
Chinese: 据说这个区域埋着财宝。

English: What is the meaning of this phrase?
Let's divide this money between you and me.
Is there a post office near here?
Is there a post office near here?
Could you recommend a nice restaurant near here?
Chinese: 你可以介紹一間附近的好餐廳嗎？

English: Is there a hospital near here?
There is a military base near here.
Chinese: 這附近有一個軍事基地。

English: Is there a mall near here?
Chinese: 附近是不是有一間購物商場？

English: Is there a golf course near here?
Chinese: 這裏附近有沒有高爾夫球場？

English: This bridge was built two years ago.
Chinese: 這座橋是在兩年前建造的。

English: This bridge looks secure.
I don't know the exact length of this bridge.
Chinese: 我不确定那座桥到底有多长。

English: This classroom can accommodate only thirty students.
Chinese: 這間班房只能容納三十個學生。

English: Keep this lesson in mind.
This textbook is good.
This textbook is too hard for me.
Chinese: 這本教科書對我來說太深了。

English: This fish is free from poison.
This fish is free from poison.
This fish is not fit to eat.
Is this fish still alive?
This milk won't keep till tomorrow.
Chinese: 這牛奶放到明天會壞的。

English: It must be dangerous to swim in this rapid stream.
Chinese: 在這麼急的急流裏游泳，一定會很危險的。

English: This measure is in accord with our policy.
Chinese: 這個議案合符我們的政策內容。

English: I don't know what this symbol stands for.
Chinese: 我不知道這個符號代表什麼意思。

English: There are some cases where the rule does not hold good.
Chinese: 有些情況之下，這條規則不能成立。

English: This rule is applied to foreigners only.
Chinese: 這條規則只適用於外國人。

English: This rule allows no exception.
Eggs are cheap this season.
Food goes bad easily in this season.
Chinese: 這個季節食物很容易變壞。

English: This train leaves at nine o'clock.
This machine is too heavy for me to carry.
Chinese: 這台機器太重了，我拿不動。

English: This machine is out of order.
This machine is easy to handle.
This machine was of great use to us all.
Chinese: 这个机器对我们都很有用。

English: I think this machine is in need of repair.
Chinese: 我认为这机器需要修理。

English: Can you explain how this machine works?
Chinese: 你可以說明一下這台機器是怎樣運作的嗎？

English: Will you help me move this desk?
Chinese: 你能幫我搬這張桌子嗎？

English: This desk is made of wood.
This desk takes up too much room.
This desk is mine.
This desk is a little low for me.
Chinese: 我覺得這張桌子低了點。

English: This desk is designed for children.
Chinese: 這張書桌是專門為兒童設計的。

English: This desk is used by me.
Chinese: 這張辦公桌是被我用的。

English: This desk is used by Tom.
Chinese: 這張桌子被 Tom 用過。

English: This desk is better than that one.
This desk cost me no less than 30000 yen.
Chinese: 这张书桌花了我不下30000日元。

English: This company manufactures computer chips.
Chinese: 這家公司生產電腦晶片。

English: We must consider the financial aspects of this project.
Chinese: 我們必須從財政方面考慮一下這個計劃。

English: These toys are suitable for girls.
These pills act on the heart.
Chinese: 这种药片对心脏有疗效。

English: Thanks very much for having me to dinner the other night.
Chinese: 谢谢那天晚上请我吃了饭。

English: In the last typhoon, the wind blew at over 200 kilometers per hour!
Chinese: 上次颳颱風時，風速超過了 200 公里每小時！

English: I got your fax the other day.
Chinese: 我前幾天收到了你的傳真。

English: These patients have trouble walking.
This amount includes tax.
There are more girls than boys in this school.
Chinese: 這間學校女孩比男孩多。

English: This school has many students.
This school supplies students with textbooks.
Chinese: 这所学校为学生提供教科书。

English: The students of this school are kind.
Chinese: 这个学校的学生很友好。

English: Any student of this school must learn one more foreign language besides English.
Chinese: 除了英语，这个学校的所有学生必须多学一门外语。

English: It's been ten years since I came to this town.
When I painted this picture, I was 23 years old.
Chinese: 我是在二十三歲的時候畫這幅畫的。

English: Look at this picture.
By whom was this picture painted?
This painting is worth a great deal of money.
This broken vase can't be repaired.
Chinese: 这个坏掉的花瓶无法修复了。

English: I mean to quit this company.
This firm ranks second in the oil trade.
Chinese: 这家公司在石油行业排名第二。

English: I felt like a fish out of water at this firm.
Chinese: 我不太適應在這間公司工作。

English: Two thirds of the employees of this company are engineers.
Chinese: 这个公司二分之三的雇员是工程师。

English: Who is the boss of this company?
Monday through Friday are work-days in this company.
Chinese: 這間公司的工作日為星期一到星期五。

English: The image quality is really bad - the resolution is so low.
Chinese: 画质真的很差 - 分辨率那么低。

English: What image did you have in mind as you painted this picture?
Chinese: 画这幅画的时候你脑海中浮现出了什么图像？

English: Now that I have finished this assignment I want to go to sleep, but I have to go to school.
Chinese: 我做完功課，想去睡覺，可是又要上學⋯⋯

English: I'd like to send these to Japan.
Chinese: 我想將這些寄送到日本。

English: I'd like to send this package to Japan.
Chinese: 我想把這個包裹寄到日本。

English: Could you keep this luggage until 3 p.m.?
Chinese: 你可以保管這個行李直到下午三點嗎？

English: Please take care not to break this vase.
Chinese: 请小心别打碎了这个花瓶。

English: This flower is beautiful, isn't it?
These flowers bloom earlier than others do.
Chinese: 這些花比別的花早開花。

English: This flower is the most beautiful of all flowers.
Chinese: 这朵花是所有花中最漂亮的。

English: This flower gives off a strong fragrance.
Chinese: 这朵花散发出强烈的香味。

English: This flower smells sweet.
What do you call this flower?
This flower is yellow, but all the others are blue.
Chinese: 這朵花是黃色的，但是其他全都是藍色的。

English: Do you want any of these flowers?
Chinese: 你要這些花中的任何一朵嗎？

English: It is dangerous to bathe in this river.
Chinese: 在这条河里游泳很危险。

English: This is an opera in five acts.
This song reminds me of my childhood.
Chinese: 這首歌勾起了我童年的回憶。

English: This song reminds me of my childhood.
Chinese: 這首歌讓我想起了我的童年。

English: Can you sing this song?
This song is very popular in Japan.
Chinese: 這首歌曲在日本很受歡迎。

English: This song was written by Foster.
Chinese: 這首歌曲是由福斯特所寫的。

English: This song was popular in the 1970s.
Chinese: 這首歌在七十年代很流行。

English: This house is not for sale.
Who owns this house?
This house belongs to my uncle.
Chinese: 這棟房子屬於我的叔叔。

English: This house must be done up.
This house is mine.
This house is mine.
This house belongs to Mr Yamada.
This house is as large again as that one.
Chinese: 這棟房子是那棟的兩倍大。

English: Who is the owner of this house?
I'm going to America this summer.
How long is this pencil?
Is this pencil yours?
I'd like to change yen to dollars.
This English composition is far from perfect.
Chinese: 这篇英语作文离完美还差得远。

English: Nobody can see this movie without being moved.
Chinese: 沒有人看了這部電影會不感動的。

English: I remember having seen this movie before.
Chinese: 我記得我以前看過這部電影。

English: I think it is worthwhile to see this film twice.
Chinese: 我覺得這部電影值得一看再看。

English: I am fed up with this wet weather.
Chinese: 我真的很討厭這種下雨天。

English: How long will this rain go on?
I'm fed up with this weather.
Going out in this rain is out of the question.
Chinese: 在雨中走出去是不可能的。

English: Don't bother coming in this rain.
Chinese: 不用麻煩在這樣的雨天來。

English: Thank you for coming all the way in this rain.
Chinese: 謝謝你大老遠在這樣的雨天來。

English: This drink is on the house.
Chinese: 這種飲料是免費招待的。

English: Please explain this sentence to me.
I've been so busy this past week that I've hardly had time to relax.
Chinese: 我上個星期忙得一點休息的時間也沒有。

English: This chair is made of plastic.
Chinese: 這把椅子是用塑膠製成的。

English: This chair is made of plastic.
This robot does whatever I say. That's a big help when I'm too tired to do anything. Not too likely, huh?
Chinese: 我叫這個機器人做甚麼，它就做甚麼。我累得不想動的時候，它就很幫得上忙。- 這種事不太可能吧？

English: This is a dead-end alley.
These lemons are fresh.
I can recommend this restaurant.
The service in this restaurant is none too fast.
Chinese: 這餐廳的服務一點效率也沒有。

English: The curry at this restaurant is good.
This rule does not apply in all cases.
Chinese: 这条规则不是任何情况下都奏效的。

English: This apple is sweet.
This apple is very red.
This apple tastes sour.
This is the most delicious apple.
Is this radio yours?
What is the price of this radio?
How much is this racket?
This is how Scott and his men arrived at the South Pole.
Chinese: 這是史考特和他的夥伴到達南極的方法。

English: Not having dealt with such a problem, they don't know what to do.
Chinese: 他們從來沒有遇過這樣的問題，所以不知道怎樣處理才好。

English: What should they do in this situation?
Chinese: 在这种情况下，他们该做什么？

English: In hard times like this, no ordinary effort can get our company out of the red.
Chinese: 在这种困难的时候，任何寻常的努力都无法使我们的公司摆脱赤字。

English: Mistakes like these are easily overlooked.
Chinese: 这种错误很容易被人忽视。

English: This message doesn't make sense.
This milk has a peculiar smell.
This damp match won't light.
Chinese: 这根湿掉的火柴点不出火的。

English: This minibus holds 25 persons.
Chinese: 这辆迷你巴士能容纳25个人。

English: Please fill this bottle with water.
This hotel has accommodations for 1,000 guests.
Chinese: 這家酒店可以容納一千人。

English: This hotel is conveniently located in terms of public transportation.
Chinese: 這間酒店的交通位置很方便。

English: This hotel was built last year.
You can hear the sound of the sea in this hotel room.
Chinese: 在這間酒店房間裏，你可以聽見海的聲音。

English: Are you staying at this hotel?
This hotel does not serve lunch.
All you have to do is push this button to take a picture.
Chinese: 你要做的就是按这个按钮拍照。

English: This button is loose.
This ball is the treasure of that boy.
Chinese: 这个球是那个男孩的宝贝。

English: This boat has six oars.
Whose pen is this?
This pen belongs to me.
How much is this pen?
How much is this pen?
What does this pen cost?
What does this pen cost?
Is there a hotel around here?
If you want this pen, I will lend it to you.
Chinese: 你想用這支筆，我就借給你吧。

English: This program cannot be run in DOS mode.
Chinese: 這個程式無法在DOS模式下執行。

English: I wonder what this phrase means.
Chinese: 我想知道这句话的意思。

English: These plums are ripe.
This blouse is cotton.
This wine tastes good.
This wine tastes good.
There is a bit of whisky in this bottle.
I promise to return this videotape within a week.
Chinese: 我保證在一個星期內把這盤錄影帶還給你。

English: How long is this visa good for?
Chinese: 這個簽證的有效期限是多久?

English: This beer tastes bitter.
This beach is a paradise for surfers.
Chinese: 这个海滩是冲浪者的天堂。

English: This bread is very delicious.
How much is this handkerchief?
This rose is very beautiful.
Could you show me this bag?
Chinese: 你能給我看看這個包嗎？

English: Is this bag yours or his?
Chinese: 那个包是你的还是他的？

English: This passport is valid for five years.
Chinese: 這本護照的有用期限為五年。

English: Does this bus go to the museum?
Does this bus go to the beach?
This bus can hold fifty people.
Chinese: 這輛巴士可以載五十個人。

English: Is this the bus for Park Ridge?
Chinese: 這是去帕克里奇的巴士？

English: This bus will take you to the museum.
Chinese: 這輛公車會載你去博物館。

English: This bus will take you to the airport.
Chinese: 这辆公交车能载你去机场。

English: You can go to the ballpark on this bus.
Chinese: 坐這個公車可以到球場。

English: Is this ladder strong enough to bear my weight?
Chinese: 这个梯子是否足够坚固以承受我的重量？

English: These scissors don't cut well.
These scissors don't cut well.
These scissors don't cut well.
Please fill this bucket with water.
There's a hole in this bucket.
There's a hole in this bucket.
The tie doesn't go with my suit.
This tie doesn't go with my suit.
Chinese: 這條領帶跟我的西裝不配。

English: How much is this tie?
This tie and that jacket go well together.
Chinese: 這條領帶和那件上衣很配。

English: Can you answer this riddle?
This pear smells nice.
The knife is not sharp.
This knife is very sharp.
This knife won't cut well.
This tunnel is twice as long as that one.
Chinese: 這條隧道是那條的兩倍長。
